FAQ reference - Question.en-GB:
Locale en-GB: 
Is Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 suitable for my dog?
FAQ reference - Question.en: Is Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 suitable for my dog?

FAQ reference - Answer.en-GB: Locale en-GB: Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is a weight loss dog food for overweight dogs. In trials, it has been shown to help overweight dogs lose 2.2% of their body weight per week. It’s also suitable for: - Regulating blood sugar in diabetic dogs, but only those who are obese (for diabetic dogs already at a healthy weight, try Dog Weight Loss & Control W2 instead). - Managing fibre-responsive colitis. - Managing lipid metabolism disorders (hyperlipidaemia). Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is not suitable for puppies, pregnant/lactating dogs, and dogs with chronic kidney disease.
FAQ reference - Answer.en:
Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is a weight loss dog food for overweight dogs. In trials, it has been shown to help overweight dogs lose 2.2% of their body weight per week. 

It’s also suitable for: 
- Regulating blood sugar in diabetic dogs, but only those who are obese (for diabetic dogs already at a healthy weight, try Dog Weight Loss & Control W2 instead). 
- Managing fibre-responsive colitis.
- Managing lipid metabolism disorders (hyperlipidaemia). 

Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is not suitable for puppies, pregnant/lactating dogs, and dogs with chronic kidney disease.

Name.en: Is Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 suitable for my dog?

FAQ reference - Question.en-GB: Locale en-GB: My dog has reached their target weight – what should I feed them now?
FAQ reference - Question.en: My dog has reached their target weight – what should I feed them now?

FAQ reference - Answer.en-GB: Locale en-GB: Congrats! Now that your dog has reached a healthy weight, you can help them stay there by switching to Weight Loss & Control W2 weight control dog food. With more energy per portion, this food is ideal for stabilising your dog's weight.
FAQ reference - Answer.en: Congrats! Now that your dog has reached a healthy weight, you can help them stay there by switching to Weight Loss & Control W2 weight control dog food. With more energy per portion, this food is ideal for stabilising your dog's weight.

Name.en: My dog has reached their target weight – what should I feed them now?
